Articles.Content: Hi all, hoping for some help with KSP1 on a PS5. My problem is that although the option to EVA is present, all I can do once my Kerbal EVA's is to re-board whatever craft they were on (using circle). The screen says let go (using cross), but nothing happens if I press x. The same seems to be true for climbing (using square) and happens everywhere (from launchpad to Mun) and for any Kerbal (so I can't rescue any of them from orbit yet. Any thoughts of things to try or check would be really appreciated. Thanks,
